title: Lokapala
description: large male figure, looking toward PR, standing on small yellow camel; PL knee bent with PL foot on camel\'s head; fists clenched and elbows bent; figure wearing helmet with upturned earflaps and large plume at center and costume elaborately painted with floral motif in green, red, orange, blue, white, black and pink with gold details; sleeves are dragons
creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
